message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $150. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features you've highlighted. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your proposal, I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on the item while also considering your feedback. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. Considering the features and value provided by the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $130. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I value your feedback and am willing to consider it. In response, I would like to suggest a price of $135 for the product. This price still reflects the high quality and value of the item, while being more flexible to accommodate your budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. I would like to propose a final offer of $130 for the product. I hope this aligns well with your valuation of the item.
